One notification

```js
const notifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    text: 'Test notification'
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Notification</button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```

One error notification

```js
const notifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    type: 'error',
    text: 'Test notification',
    timeout: 2000
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Error Notification</button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```

Two success notifications

```js
const notifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    type: 'success',
    text: 'action 1 succeded',
    timeout: 2000
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    type: 'success',
    text: 'action 2 succeded',
    timeout: 5000
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Success Notifications</button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```

Several notifications with timeouts

```js
const notifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    text: 'Hello!',
    timeout: 1000
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    text: 'we are',
    timeout: 2000
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    text: 'delayed notifications',
    timeout: 3000
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Notifications</button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```

Change notification's text

```js
const defaultNotifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    text: '',
    timeout: 2000
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);
const [notifications, setNotifications] = React.useState(defaultNotifications);

<div>
  <input
    onInput={e => setNotifications([{ ...notifications[0], text: e.target.value }])}
    style={{ marginRight: '20px' }}
    type="text"
    placeholder="Type new notification text"
  />
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Notification</button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```

Add new notification

```js
const defaultNotifications = [
  {
    id: '1',
    text: 'old text',
    timeout: 2000
  }
];

const newNotifications = [
  ...defaultNotifications,
  {
    id: '2',
    text: 'new text',
    timeout: 4000
  }
];

const [areNotificationsActive, setNotificationsActive] = React.useState(false);
const [notifications, setNotifications] = React.useState(defaultNotifications);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setNotificationsActive(true)}>Show Notification</button>
  <button
    style={{ marginLeft: '20px', backgroundColor: '#83aee5' }}
    onClick={() => setNotifications(newNotifications)}
  >
    Add notification
  </button>
  {areNotificationsActive && (
    <Notifications
      notifications={notifications}
      onRemoveAllNotifications={() => setNotificationsActive(false)}
    />
  )}
</div>;
```
